data.title: Greg Davis - Men's Soccer
data.meta_description: Greg Davis (10) Forward/Midfield  - 2013: Davis was named a captain this season. Started and appeared in 16 games. Scored three goals and recorded two assists this
data.text:
2013: Davis was named a captain this season. Started and appeared in 16 games. Scored three goals and recorded two assists this season.

2012: Appeared in eight games and started sixâ€¦ Had 13 shots and three were on goal.

2012 Game-by-Game

Prior to Marist: Davis joins the Red Foxes following two years at Providence College ... The leading scorer for the Friars in 2011, the rising junior completed his career with the Friars with 10 goals, 3 assists and 23 points ... Prior to competing in the Big East, played four years of high school soccer at Archbishop Molloy ... Earned CHSAA League Most Valuable Player honors and was named City Player of the Year as a junior and was an Honorable Mention All-American as a senior ... Davis played club soccer for BW Gottschee, the same club as teammates Stephan Brossard, Tony Carreras, Nicolas Fedus and Joe Ruocco.
